dialogueContent.words: My Lady, we're loading the materials now. My people are working as quickly as we can, given the delicate nature of the cargo.
Commander, those tubes are LosTech and must be handled with extraordinary care, so the team will need you to keep any enemy forces well away from the base.
I'm getting reports that a Federated Suns lance is already inbound, so expect contact shortly.
Keep the facility standing, Commander. We cannot afford to lose these materials.

That's it, Commander; the teams are done loading. They're ready to move out, once you give the word that the way is clear. You'll need to deploy immediately to act as their escort. Unfortunately, there's no time for resupply.
I just lost contact with the Maskirovka team, Commander. Davion's overrun their position. We've lost our chance.
We're in position! All engineers have disembarked from the personnel carriers. The APCs will scatter and support you. Keep the turrets online, and we'll keep firing.
Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.
Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.
Commander, a target building has been demolished. Ensure the integrity of the remaining buildings.
Commander, we've lost most of the cargo at this point, but we can still salvage this situation. Just keep that building standing at all costs.

Mercenary Commmander, we've recieved word of the assault on your position. Reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.
Commander, on this outing we have some additional support from our employer.
They have point defenses set up around the base. However, they are off-line.
We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.
Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good luck!

longDescription: I know this was your call, Commander, but frankly I'd prefer to just torch their "materials" and leave. This is vile.

objectiveList.description: Defend Targeted Base Structures from Attackers
objectiveList.title: Defend the Target Buildings

objectiveList.description: Destroy the enemy vanguard force, the first wave.
objectiveList.title: Destroy the Davion Vanguard

objectiveList.description: Optional objective to keep ALL target structures intact.
objectiveList.title: Defend ALL Target Buildings from Destruction

objectiveList.description: Objective for tracking the time left in the mission. While the player it told to Hold Out for Reinforcements
objectiveList.title: Hold Out Until Loading Is Complete

objectiveList.description: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses in order to take control of them.
objectiveList.title: Escort Engineer APCs to the Base Defenses

objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance
objectiveList.title: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance

objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance
objectiveList.title: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance

shortDescription: My Maskirovka liaison wishes me to convey her thanks, Commander. We recognize that this is making your job more difficult, but the Confederation has significant plans, currently in progress, that your help in this matter will facilitate. That said, we've received word that several Davion lances are en route to the facility to retake it. I need you to hold that facility, Commander. Loading the materials aboard the transport vehicles will take time, and until it's complete, we cannot move our people.
